title: Happy Monday, Back To Church, Church Complaints, Sex Story, Becoming Our Parents, Apologize Baby, Old Folks and Cell Phones, Us VS Millennials, Breakup Handbook, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Happy Monday, Back To Church, Church Complaints, Sex Story, Becoming Our Parents, Apologize Baby, Old Folks and Cell Phones, Us VS Millennials, Breakup Handbook, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Today is a special Monday that opens up with bear trap talk. Signs you need to go back to church. Church Complaints is back. There is a steveharveyfm.com story on sex. We become our parents when we do this. Comedy Roulette is here. Old folk and cell phones may not be the best combo. What we had vs what millennials have. Uncle Steve has the breakup handbook. Closing Remarks today has Big Dog explaining how friendship is essential to the soul and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
